title: A cogent observation
author: VD
content_html: It’s disappointing, but I think Glenn Reynolds has the right of it:  “[I]n real life Joss Whedon would have been on the side of the Alliance.”
content_text:
It’s disappointing, but I think Glenn Reynolds
has the right of it
:
“[I]n real life Joss Whedon would have been on the side of the Alliance.”
